about_the_game:
Collect notes to fill your octave.


Play notes to move. Hear notes to move again.


Different notes, different movements.


Notes stack and harmonize to the music. The order of your melody determines how you move, allowing for deep combos and complex routing through levels.

Built by Kaizo Veterans:


Designed with love by early founders in the kaizo scene. Playtested by a roster of world-record holders and esport veterans. We want you to experience kaizo like we did, and we want you to succeed at it.

Music-Driven Design:


Experience a single evolving piece of music as the level progresses with our prog-opera inspired soundtrack. Every note you play harmonizes as a specific interval to the music, allowing for easy audio cues for speedrunners and kaizo enthusiasts.

Quicksaves and Quickloads:


Never get stuck in a level. Inpulse comes with emulator-style savestates which load instantaneously. Saves are mapped to your controller by default and increment automatically so that you never have to worry about overwriting past progress.

Adjustable Retry Speeds:


Set the pace of gameplay to your liking. Reload the level instantly to stay in the zone or pause a moment to analyze what you did.

Input Playback:


Analyze input playback on a DDR-style input screen.

Level Preview:


Preview the level with a tutorial character or race against it for speed. Record your own demos and send them to your friends or challenge our builtin speed-run files from top kaizo players.

Builtin TAS Support:


Save and load while recording to create a perfect run, and watch it at arbitrary playback speeds.

Builtin Twitch Chat:


One monitor? No problem! Fullscreen the game and read your twitch chat directly on the HUD.

Edit any level instantly:


Pause the game at any moment and modify the level. The game is the editor.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You are flute. You are kaizo. You are music. Audiate your movement through the environment, and catch the sounds to propel yourself through the air. A hand-drawn, 2D musical platforming experience designed to make you into a kaizo master. March to your own music in Inpulse.
